titleSection.name: OpsHub Integration Manager for VersionOne and FogBugz Integration
titleSection.shortDescription: Integrating VersionOne and FogBugz helps you leverage your existing tool chain and reach more people.

descriptionSection.description: Integrating VersionOne and FogBugz helps you leverage your existing tool chain and reach more people. This integration helps manage overlap between tools with a two-way flow of defects, enabling teams to leverage existing automated workflows and defect reporting while adding the practice of agile project management. This integration is provided by OpsHub. Please contact info@versionone.com for more information.

commercial.shortDescription: The product is stable and supported.
